incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94it1","text":"The labelling of phosphorylated Alpha-synuclein is considered as a marker of the PFF toxicity and should be performed to test the PFF before in vivo Bring the volume to 50 ml with PBS. This solution works best if it is used at room temperature, although others report optimal results when it is warmed to 37degrees. This solution can be stored at 4 degrees celsius, protected from light, for 1 week.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pebd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8irtk","text":"PBS/BSA0.005%/TWEEN0.05% ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0u9t","text":"Dissolve 1mg BSA in 10mL PBS. Use 10uL of this solution for 20mL of PBS. Add 10uL Tween 20. Prepare this fresh on the day of use. All the washing steps are done for 10min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddb8s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lijg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"4373BDA4341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Purified status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5dn86","text":"Aspirate the medium from coverslips (aspirate from only a few coverslips at a time).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13eli","text":"Proceed or store in the fridge in PBS, protected from light, for up to 1 week.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6f2s","text":"Block in Donkey Serum 1:20 in PBS for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bil1s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"3265AFD022EA11EDB9D8E347C439A20F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e38sk","text":"During the blocking, prepare the primary antibody solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdu6t","text":"In PBS/BSA/TWEEN, add Biolegend psyn (MMS-5091) Mouse (1:1000) and Abcam MAP2 (ab5392) chicken Millipore (1:2000).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ke34","text":"Incubate in secondary antibody solution for    at    in the DARK.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8i6bd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"B2F2784022EA11EDB9D8E347C439A20F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B8C62B4022EA11EDB9D8E347C439A20F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3j4ce","text":"Mount the coverslips onto glass slides with Prolong Gold mounting medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jgvb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58b3o","text":"During the washes, prepare the secondary antibody solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ghn2","text":"In PBS/BSA/TWEEN, add Alexa Fluor 488 donkey anti-mouse (1:1000) + Alexa Fluor 594 donkey anti-chicken (1:1000).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
